Item.name: Popnut
Item.description: Kids love to play with them. Needs to be put in water to pop it open and be able to consume it.

Item.name: Popped Popnut
Item.description: It's popped open, ready to be consumed. Used in some recipes.

Item.name: Mutated Tobacco Bud
Item.description: A mutated variant of the tobacco bud. Fragile, but strong in flavour and smell.
